name: OVERGAME
description:
OVERGAME is a breaking-the-4th-wall story-rich and funny meta game with a plot twist.

/!/ A little bugfix update is coming soon

/!/ When you finished the game entirely, plz restart the page if you want to play a second time, otherwise, there will be game breaking bugs I need to fix /!/

"Welcome to OVERGAME, 

the most adaptative experience ever made, 

unique to each player,

designed live with the gamedevs. 

Well... at least that's what they're saying...."

OVERGAME started as a Community Game Jam which theme was " The Game is a Liar !".

(a little bugfix update is coming soon)

2 MORE GAMES ARE COMING BEFORE THE END OF OCTOBER

Follow to stay tuned :)

----------------------------------------

Pietro Ferrantelli - Game Design, Programing, UI, Visual FX, Sound and Pixel Art @PietroFerrantel
